bug.author: EnricoMi
bug.description: We can't move from Spark 3.0.0-dev2 to the 3.0.0 release because test breaks. Fix the test and move to Spark 3.0.0 again (see <denchmark-link:https://github.com/horovod/horovod/pull/2064>#2064</denchmark-link> ). I have raised <denchmark-link:https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SPARK-32120>Jira ticket SPARK-32120</denchmark-link> to see if this is a bug or a new feature in 3.0.0 release. That test might have been fixed by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/horovod/horovod/pull/2063#issuecomment-650811959>#2063 (comment)</denchmark-link> .
